channel.title: Old Stork/Point system source(s)?
channel.description:
Does anyone have any of the Storkpk-Like sources with the point system implemented? And the Client? Looking for the best/most stable/most updated one thats currently released. Just want something to mess around with. After 3 years I thought id give RSC another go.
Id really appreciate it if anyone could upload a source that meets the description. If possible, It would be also appreciated if anyone could upload a EasyRSC-Based server + Client. One of the more-updated version of EasyRSC if possible. (It would be a time saver if anyone has the EasyRSC that has stork-pk-like features, such as the point system, and layout)
Thanks.
Divinity

item.title: Old Stork/Point system source(s)?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Divinity, post:6, topic:442127”][quote author=latifundio link=topic=544774.msg3993713#msg3993713 date=1336960258]
http://subversion.assembla.com/svn/darkquest/
peeter added a point system to it.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,519010.0.html
That’s easyrscd by the dijinn, he even hosted it for a while.
[/quote]

Is Djinn’s easyrsc one of the best rsceasy sources available? And does anyone know if there is one with a points-based system implemented?

One more question. How stable is the EasyRSC source? Compared to that of RSCD[/quote]
It’s almost the same. Few minor bugs though.

Read full topic
